records.content:
ASC-bla is a C++ library for basic linear algebra operations.
The library provides template classes Vector and Matrix.

records.content:
install it via git-clone:git clone https://github.com/TUWien-ASC/ASC-bla.git

To configure and build some tests docd ASC-bla
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make
